author: thorsten
msg: Added first version of the LocationmapSourceFactory. With this it is possible to request locationmap source via lm://my-location which makes it easier to use it without contacting a input module in java and any other files. The problem ATM is that the mounts of the locationmap are not resolved when using the factory. Only matches are resolved only problems.

author: cdoremus
msg: Now builds bundled Tomcat distribution. See comments in file for manual process.
